chapter.text: 51|1|saktiyayi (peati) vitarikkeantirikkunnava (karrukal) tanneyana, satyam
51|2|(jala) bharam vahikkunna (meghannal) tanneyana, satyam
51|3|nisprayasam sancarikkunnava (kappalukal) tanneyana, satyam
51|4|karyannal vibhajiccu keatukkunnavar (malakkukal) tanneyana, satyam
51|5|tirccayayum ninnalkku takkit nalkappetunna karyam satyamayittullat tanneyakunnu
51|6|tirccayayum n'yayavidhi sambhavikkunnatu tanneyakunnu
51|7|vividha pathannalulla akasam tanneyana,satyam
51|8|tirccayayum ninnal vibhinnamaya abhiprayattilakunnu
51|9|(satyattil ninn‌) terrikkappettavan atil ninn (khur'anil ninn‌) terrikkappetunnu
51|10|uhapeahakkar sapikkappetatte
51|11|vivarakketil matimarannu kaliyunnavar
51|12|n'yayavidhiyute nal eppealayirikkum ennavar ceadikkunnu
51|13|narakagniyil avar pariksanattin vidheyarakunna divasamatre at‌
51|14|(avareat parayappetum:) ninnalkkulla pariksanam ninnal anubhavicc kealluvin. ninnal enteannin dhrtikuttikkeantirunnuvea atatre it‌
51|15|tirccayayum suksmata palikkunnavar svargatteappukalilum aruvikalilumayirikkum
51|16|avarkk avarute raksitav nalkiyat erruvannikkeant‌. tirccayayum avar atinu mump sad‌vrttarayirunnu
51|17|ratriyil ninn alpabhagame avar urannaruntayirunnullu
51|18|ratriyute antyavelakalil avar papameacanam tetunnavarayirunnu
51|19|avarute svattukkalilakatte ceadikkunnavannum (upajivanam) tatayappettavannum oru avakasamuntayirikkukayum ceyyum
51|20|drdhavisvasamullavarkk bhumiyil pala drstantannalumunt‌
51|21|ninnalil tanneyum (pala drstantannalunt‌.)ennitt ninnal kantariyunnille
51|22|akasatt ninnalkkulla upajivanavum, ninnaleat vagdanam ceyyappetunna karyannalumunt‌
51|23|ennal akasattinreyum bhumiyuteyum raksitavine tanneyana, satyam! ninnal sansarikkunnu ennatu peale tirccayayum it satyamakunnu
51|24|ibrahiminre man'yaraya atithikale parriyulla vartta ninakk vannukittiyittuntea
51|25|avar addehattinre atuttu katannu vannitt salam paranna samayatt addeham parannu: salam (ninnal) aparicitaraya alukalanallea
51|26|anantaram addeham dhrtiyil tanre bharyayute atuttekk cennu. ennitt oru taticca kalakkuttiye (veviccu) keantuvannu
51|27|ennitt at avarute atuttekk veccu. addeham parannu: ninnal tinnunnille
51|28|appeal avarepparri addehattinre manas'sil bhayam katannu kuti. avar parannu: tankal bhayappetenta. addehattin jnaniyaya oru ankuttiye parri avar santeasavartta ariyikkukayum ceytu
51|29|appeal addehattinre bharya uccattil oru sabdamuntakkikkeant munneatt vannu. ennitt tanre mukhattaticcukeant parannu: vandhyayaya oru kilaviyanea (prasavikkan peakunnat‌)
51|30|avar (dutanmar) parannu: aprakaram tanneyakunnu ninre raksitav parannirikkunnat‌. tirccayayum avan tanneyakunnu yuktimanum jnaniyum ayittullavan
51|31|addeham ceadiccu: he; dutanmare, appeal ninnalute karyamentan‌
51|32|avar parannu: nannal kurravalikalaya oru janatayilekk ayakkappettatakunnu
51|33|kalimannukeantulla kallukal nannal avarute nere ayakkuvan venti
51|34|atikramakarikalkk venti tannalute raksitavinre atukkal atayalappetuttiya (kallukal)
51|35|appeal satyavisvasikalil pettavarayi avite untayirunnavare nam puratt keantu vannu.(raksapetutti)
51|36|ennal muslinkalutetaya oru vitallate nam avite kantettiyilla
51|37|vedanayeriya siksa bhayappetunnavarkk oru drstantam nam avite avasesippikkukayum ceytu
51|38|musayute caritrattilumunt (drstantannal) vyaktamaya adhikarika pramanavumayi phir'aunre atuttekk nam addehatte niyeagicca sandarbham
51|39|appeal avan tanre saktiyil ahankaricc pintirinnu kalayukayan ceytat‌. (musa) oru jalavidyakkaranea allenkil bhrantanea enn avan parayukayum ceytu
51|40|atinal avaneyum avanre sain'yannaleyum nam pitikutukayum, ennitt avare katalil eriyukayum ceytu. avan tanneyayirunnu akseparhan
51|41|ad janatayilum (drstantamunt‌) vandhyamaya karr nam avarute nere ayacca sandarbham
51|42|a karr etearu vastuvinmel cennettiyea, atine dravicca turumpu peale akkate at vitumayirunnilla
51|43|thamud janatayilum (drstantamunt‌.) oru samayam vare ninnal sukham anubhavicc kealluka. enn avareat parayappetta sandarbham
51|44|ennitt avar tannalute raksitavinre kalpanakketirayi dhikkaram kaikkeantu. atinal avar neakkikkeantirikke a ghearanadam avare pitikuti
51|45|appeal avarkk elunnerru peakan kalivuntayilla. avar raksanatapatikaletukkunnavarayatumilla
51|46|atinu mump nuhinre janatayeyum (nam nasippikkukayuntayi.) tirccayayum avar adharm'makarikalaya oru janatayayirunnu
51|47|akasamakatte nam atine sakti keant nirmiccirikkunnu. tirccayayum nam vikasippiccetukkunnavanakunnu
51|48|bhumiyakatte nam atine oru virippakkiyirikkunnu. ennal at vitaniccavan etra nallavan
51|49|ella vastukkalil ninnum i rant inakale nam srsticcirikkunnu. ninnal aleacicc manas'silakkuvan venti
51|50|atinal ninnal allahuvinkalekk oticcelluka. tirccayayum nan ninnalkk avanre atukkal ninnulla vyaktamaya takkitukaranakunnu
51|51|allahuveateappam marrearu daivatteyum ninnal sthapikkatirikkukayum ceyyuka. tirccayayum nan ninnalkk avanre atukkal ninnulla vyaktamaya takkitukaranakunnu
51|52|aprakaram tanne ivarute purvvikanmarute atutt etearu rasul vannappealum jalavidyakkaranennea, bhrantanennea avar parayatirunnittilla
51|53|atin (annane parayanamenn‌) avar an'yean'yam vasviyyatt ceytirikkukayanea? alla, avar atikramakarikalaya oru janatayakunnu
51|54|akayal ni avaril ninn tirinnukalayuka. ni akseparhanalla
51|55|ni ulbeadhippikkuka. tirccayayum ulbeadhanam satyavisvasikalkk prayeajanam ceyyum
51|56|jinnukaleyum manusyareyum enne aradhikkuvan ventiyallate nan srsticcittilla
51|57|nan avaril ninn upajivanameannum agrahikkunnilla. avar enikk bhaksanam nalkanamennum nan agrahikkunnilla
51|58|tirccayayum allahu tanneyan upajivanam nalkunnavanum saktanum prabalanum
51|59|tirccayayum (inn‌) akramam ceyyunnavarkk (purvvikaraya) tannalute kuttalikalkku labhicca vihitam pealeyulla vihitam tanneyunt‌. atinal enneat avar dhrtikuttatirikkatte
51|60|appeal tannalkk takkit nalkappetunnataya a divasam nimittam satyanisedhikalkku
